product_name: Ocean Kayak Nalu Stand Up Paddleboard - 11'
long_description: The Ocean Kayak NaluTM 11 ft. stand-up paddleboard offers a versatile experience on the water: when you get tired of paddling while standing, just sit down and paddle it like a sit-on-top kayak!
short_description: The Ocean Kayak NaluTM 11 ft. stand-up paddleboard offers a versatile experience on the water: when you get tired of paddling while standing, just sit down and paddle it like a sit-on-top kayak!
